The time of year where I fork out the cash to keep the website, forum, and =
samuraiwiki afloat has arrived, and so if anyone is willing or interested i=
n donating any amount regardless of how small towards the maintenance of th=
e website, you can do so here via the paypal button:

http://www.samurai-ar=
chives.com/donate1.html

If you don't want to part with cash, but might lik=
e something for your efforts, you can also support the Samurai Archives by =
purchasing books at the bookstore, or items at the online Samurai Archives =
shop:

http://www.cafepress.com/samuraiarchives

http://astore.amazon.com/s=
amurai-20

Anything is appreciated, and thanks for your support!

Webmaster=
